name: Spin The Wheel
description:
Spin The Wheel:

A game about spinning a wheel and cutting your losses.

How to play:

Space to spin the wheel. 

If you go under 0 points, then you Lose.

Click stop to cut your losses and win with the amount of points that you have.

Credits:

I used this pallete.

I used this to make music and sfx.

And this to make pixel art.

Made for Trijam #195 in 3hours, 13mins, 16secs
